Package com.codewithej.realestateapi.service

Interface ClientService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientServiceImpl
public interface ClientService
Interface for client-related operations.

Defines the contract for services handling the creation, modification, deletion, and querying of client entities, including managing their associated agent and properties of interest.

  • Method Details

    • createClient

      ClientDTO createClient(ClientDTO clientDTO)
      Creates a new client.
      Parameters:
      clientDTO - The data transfer object containing the client's details.
      Returns:
      The created client, as a DTO.

    • updateClient

      ClientDTO updateClient(Long id, ClientDTO clientDTO)
      Updates an existing client.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the client to update.
      clientDTO - The updated client details.
      Returns:
      The updated client, as a DTO.

    • deleteClient

      void deleteClient(Long id)
      Deletes a client by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the client to delete.

    • getClientById

      ClientDTO getClientById(Long id)
      Retrieves a client by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the client.
      Returns:
      The requested client, as a DTO.

    • getAllClients

      List<ClientDTO> getAllClients()
      Retrieves all clients.
      Returns:
      A list of all clients, as DTOs.

    • findClientsByName

      List<ClientDTO> findClientsByName(String name)
      Finds clients by name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name to search for.
      Returns:
      A list of clients whose names contain the search term.

    • setClientAgent

      ClientDTO setClientAgent(Long clientId, Long agentId)
      Assigns an agent to a client.
      Parameters:
      clientId - The ID of the client.
      agentId - The ID of the agent to be assigned.
      Returns:
      The updated client, as a DTO.

    • setInterestedProperties

      Set<ClientDTO> setInterestedProperties(Long clientId, Set<Long> propertyIds)
      Sets the properties in which a client is interested.
      Parameters:
      clientId - The ID of the client.
      propertyIds - The IDs of the properties of interest.
      Returns:
      The updated client, as a DTO, with the new set of interested properties.

    • getInterestedProperties

      Set<ClientDTO> getInterestedProperties(Long clientId)
      Retrieves the properties in which a client is interested.
      Parameters:
      clientId - The ID of the client.
      Returns:
      A set of properties, as DTOs, in which the client is interested.
